System Shock: Stunned for 1 round as your brain re-wires.
Finger Obsession: Fascinated by new anatomy. Disadvantage on Initiative for first combat.
Muscle Memory Mismatch: First attack roll is an automatic 1.
Sensory Overload: Disadvantage on Perception for 1 hour.
New Face, Who Dis?: You don't recognize your allies for 1d4 minutes.
Hyper-Active: Haste effect for 2 rounds, then 1 level of Exhaustion.
Elemental Leak: First hit deals an extra 2d6 Force damage.
Appetite Shift: Overwhelming urge to eat something non-edible (dirt, ink, gold).
Foreign Tongue: Can only speak a random exotic language for 1 hour.
Total Amnesia: You forget your name but keep your skills. Roleplay focus.
Aura of Luck: Gain 1 'Regeneration Inspiration' (d10) to use once.
Gravitational Glitch: Hover 1 inch off the ground for 1 hour.
Personality Flip: Character traits shift to the exact opposite.
Combat Instincts: Take the Attack action immediately upon waking.
Fragile Form: Max HP reduced by 5 until first Long Rest.
Vocal Shift: Voice becomes 3 octaves higher or lower.
Burst of Life: You and allies within 10ft heal 2d10 HP on arrival.
The Sleepy Regenerist: DC 10 Wisdom save or fall asleep for 1 minute.
Perfect Sync: Advantage on your next 3 d20 rolls.
The Chosen One: Gain 1 free Feat of choice until next death.
